original_text: The other servants of the king saw what had happened. They were very upset about it. So they went to see the king. They told him about everything that had happened.
korean_text: 그 동료들이 그것을 보고 몹시 딱하게 여겨 주인에게 가서 그 일을 다 알리니

sentences.original_text: The other servants of the king
They were very upset about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 일에 대해 매우 화가 났습니다

sentences.original_text: So they went to see the king

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 모든 것에 대해 이야기했습니다
